p: Ambient temperature and rainfall are also important factors that directly affect the development of dengue virus in major mosquito vectors Ae. aegypti and Ae. albopictus. Climate change will not only affect the rate of mosquito development, but also the virus incubation time [ 35]. In other words, climatic factors influence dengue ecology both directly and indirectly by affecting mosquito growth dynamics, virus replication, and mosquitoâ€“human interactions [ 9].
